version_description:
New Look & Feel. Fix iOS 7 support.
Minor bug fixing.
IBAN changes & Minor bug fixes
Bug fixed and enhancements.

• New modern easy to use interface
• New usability features (such as scrolling menus, “swiping” to easily step to the previous screen)
• ATM, Branch and Life Rewards locator and Route Planner
• QNB Chat
• Life Rewards (including points redemption)
• Utility payments from Cards
• Easy and quick SMS approval for Add/Manage Beneficiaries
• Western Union (Manage Beneficiaries and Payments)
• Application for QNB Products through Mobile Banking
• View Loan details
• English, Arabic, French language support
• Contact with QNB and request for appointment with Account Representative
• This is beside all our convenient banking transactions such as Account management, Funds transfers, Credit Cards and Bill payments and much more
Enhancements and bug fixes.
Minor enhancements

To make your Mobile Banking experience more convenient and secure we are continously enhancing QNB Mobile Banking.

New features with this release:

- Device Registration (if you register your device with one time SMS PIN, SMS PIN will not be required again for further QNB Mobile Banking accesses)
- Vodafone Bill payments and Topups
- Change Username
- Forgot Username
- Forgot Password
- Change Security Hint Question
- My Messages
- Minor bug fixes
iOS 10 compatibility update

New enhancements with this release:

* Mobile Cash via QNB Mobile Banking (you can send money to any Ooredoo and Vodafone customers and they can withdraw the amount instantly at any QNB ATM)
* Track Mobile Cash Payments
* Qatar Cool bill payments from Accounts, Cards and Life Rewards loyalty account
* Track Payments (including Kahramaa, Ooredoo, Vodafone, Qatar Cool)
* Use your camera to find an ATM, Branch or Life Rewards partner in any of the locators, just click to the "eye" icon to switch to “Augmented Reality” view
* Now you can choose Google Maps or Apple Maps to plan your route to an ATM, Branch or Life Rewards loyalty partner
* When you press the QNB Mobile App icon you have more options to access (“3D touch” support from iPhone 6S)
* Location based notifications and offers (iBeacon)
* QNB Mobile Banking now is available for customers in Kuwait and Oman
* Usability enhancements in Transfers, Cards and Life Rewards modules
* Now you can apply for QNB products more conveniently
* Minor bug fixes

- Direct transfers to India (now your fund transfers from Qatari Riyal to Indian Rupee are processed instantly)
- Now you can redeem your Life Rewards points instantly in exchange for Qmiles transferrable to any Qatar Airways Privilege Club member
- QNB Mobile Banking now is available for customers in France
- Other minor enhancements
Introducing Mobile Pay for Oman (after login to QNB Mobile Banking Oman unit under Transfers/Mobile Pay)

We regularly update QNB Mobile Banking to bring you a seamless and secure experience. The new release includes the following:
- Simpler and faster beneficiary creation and modification
- Fund Transfer and Mobile Cash enhancements (Voucher validity reduced to 24 hours after expiry)
- Other enhancements and bug fixes
Minor enhancements.

We regularly update QNB Mobile Banking App to bring you a seamless and secure experience. This new release includes the following updates:
· Global Account Transfer enhancement (now you can view and transfer within your international QNB accounts regardless of the country from which you are logged in)
· Notification prior to the expiry of your Qatar ID
· Western Union, India transfers and security enhancements
Kahramaa enhancements (customers are now required to enter QID or company registration (CR) number of the associated kahramaa account.

We regularly update QNB Mobile Banking to bring you a seamless and secure experience. The new release includes the following:

- Cash@Speed (you can now make cash advance from your credit card balance to your current and/or saving accounts)
- Displaying average waiting time and waiting customers for QNB branches
- Branch appointment booking (you can instantly request a ticket or book a future appointment for QNB branches)
- QNB Mobile Banking now is available for QNB France and QNB UK
- Convenience enhancements (displaying payment fees, and other minor enhancements)
- iPhone X optimized screen layout

· IPO: now you can register yourself and your family members then subscribe for Initial Public Offering under Accounts/IPO menu.

· Creating QNB fund transfer beneficiaries with QR code: now you can share your own QNB account details through a secure QR code (from Accounts/My IBAN/Show My QR menu) with others, then the payer can add you as a beneficiary by capturing the QR code with QNB Mobile Banking (through Transfers/Beneficiaries/New/Add QR menu), and easily review and activate the beneficiary.

- Easier to create beneficiaries by simply “Copy and Paste” account numbers and names

- Now the beneficiary names are also included into the transfer notification SMS-es

- QNB Mobile Banking now is available for Tunis

- Device Registration and Biometric Authentication now is available for Kuwait and Oman as well

- MPay: once you register you can select a default account which will be associated with your mobile number (under Transfers/MPay), then you can transfer to any mobile number or alias who registered for the service at any Qatari Bank.
-Minor Enhancements.

- ATM QR code access (you can access a QNB ATM without using your debit or credit card. Select
ATM QR from the footer menu, then scan the QR code displayed under the QNB ATM
Cardless/QR Code Scan menu)
- QNB announcements (you can see important announcements from QNB after login)
- Fund Transfer enhancements:
o Transfers up to 5000 QAR can be made without SMS PIN
o Additional guiding notes added to provide a safer experience
- My Messages (you can receive messages from QNB which can be viewed under Info/My
Messages menu)
- Minor enhancements on MPay, Security etc.

• New modern easy to use interface
• New usability features (such as scrolling menus, “swiping” to easily step to the previous screen)
• ATM, Branch and Life Rewards locator and Route Planner
• QNB Chat
• Life Rewards (including points redemption)
• Utility payments from Cards
• Easy and quick SMS approval for Add/Manage Beneficiaries
• Western Union (Manage Beneficiaries and Payments)
• Application for QNB Products through Mobile Banking
• View Loan details
• English, Arabic, French language support
• Contact with QNB and request for appointment with Account Representative
• This is beside all our convenient banking transactions such as Account management, Funds transfers, Credit Cards and Bill payments and much more

We regularly update QNB Mobile Banking to bring you a seamless and secure experience. The new release includes the following:

- Cash@Speed (you can now make cash advance from your credit card balance to your current and/or saving accounts)
- Displaying average waiting time and waiting customers for QNB branches
- Branch appointment booking (you can instantly request a ticket or book a future appointment for QNB branches)
- QNB Mobile Banking now is available for QNB France and QNB UK
- Convenience enhancements (displaying payment fees, and other minor enhancements)
- iPhone X optimized screen layout
